title: Vikings of today: a brief tour of Norway
brief_description: Tourist attractions and traditions of Norway including the towns of Hammerfest and Finmark; the harbour at Oslo, the merchant navy and a tour of the city; Sandefjord beach and the whaling fleet; a folk dance festival; and Bergen on the West Coast.
